name: Dragons' Den
overview: Canadian version of the reality show in which budding entrepreneurs pitch their business ideas to a panel of venture capitalists in the hopes of securing business financing.

seasons.name: Season 8
seasons.overview: The Dragons are back! But this time, it's a different den. Canada's highest-rated unscripted TV show returns with a brand new, ominous den. Each week, see entrepreneurs brave a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to face five multi-millionaires who have the cash and the know-how to catapult companies to commercial success. The competition is fierce as all five Dragons battle it out for the best business ideas in the country. Catch special episodes including a cheeky "all-Canadian" themed show, built around some of Canada's classic foods and pastimes. The season will also feature the fan favourite "Student Show," where the country's youngest entrepreneurs attempt to school the Dragons, and the highly anticipated "Update Special," where the Dragons will drop in on DRAGONS' DEN alumni to find out what life is like after the Den.

seasons.name: Season 9
seasons.overview: DRAGONS' DEN is back with two new Dragons! Restaurant magnate Vikram Vij and the reigning rock star of Canadian finance, Michael Wekerle, join the panel on Canada's top-rated entertainment show. Each week, entrepreneurs have a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to pitch their business idea to financiers with the cash and the know-how to catapult companies to commercial success.

seasons.name: Season 10
seasons.overview:
A Canadian success story in its own right, DRAGONS' DEN is a show where good ideas get rewarded and bad ideas get burned, Canadian entrepreneurs and audiences have a front row seat to this country's top business leaders and risk-takers.

Each week, entrepreneurs have a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to pitch their business idea to financiers with the cash and the know-how to catapult companies to commercial success and audiences gain insights into how to make your dreams come true.

This season, three exciting new dragons joining the den: Joe Mimran, founder of Joe Fresh; Michele Romanow, cofounder of buytopia.ca, one of Canada's top daily deal sites; and Manjit Minhas, co-founder and co-owner of Minhas Breweries and Distillery.

seasons.name: Season 11
seasons.overview: DRAGONS' DEN is a show where aspiring entrepreneurs pitch their business concepts and products to a panel of Canadian business moguls who have the cash and the know-how to make it happen.

seasons.name: Season 12
seasons.overview: Dragons' Den returns with fan favourite, Arlene Dickinson! This season sizzles with 20 dramatic episodes featuring six multi-millionaires who have the knowledge and experience to turn worthwhile ideas into incredible fortunes. Arlene Dickinson, Jim Treliving, Joe Mimran, Manjit Minhas, Michael Wekerle and Michele Romanow.

seasons.name: Season 13
seasons.overview: DRAGONS' DEN offers audiences a front-row view as the country's top business moguls wheel and deal with entrepreneurs who dare to brave the Den. Hosted by Dianne Buckner, Season 13 will introduce two new Dragon investors, Lane Merrifield and Vincenzo Guzzo, joining Arlene Dickinson, Jim Treliving, Manjit Minhas and Michele Romanow in the Den.

seasons.name: Season 14
seasons.overview: Dragons’ Den returns for its 14th season, heating up with the best in Canadian business and a collection of specials. The fan-favourite "Family Special" episode returns alongside two new emerging themes: “Upcycle” which showcases businesses that focus on a brighter future by reducing their carbon footprint; and “Disrupt-Den” featuring game-changing entrepreneurs looking to shake up their established industries.

seasons.name: Season 17
seasons.overview: Robert Herjavec returns to the Den for an exciting 17th season of Dragons' Den!

seasons.name: Season 18
seasons.overview: Dragons’ Den returns for its 18th season with 16 brand new episodes! Watch as a fresh crop of entrepreneurs face the fire, pitching to Canada’s most successful business tycoons.

seasons.name: Season 19
seasons.overview: Budding entrepreneurs, inventors, and small businessmen pitch their ideas to five "dragons"--real-life business leaders and millionaires.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: An exercise machine has the Dragons lacking motivation; a tidal energy bridge gets a dose of reality; and two entrepreneurs enter the Den to pitch their magnetic gift card idea to the Dragons.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The Dragons are presented with a business idea for self-help "Mystical Cards"; a pair of super binoculars claim to be able to see through almost anything; and one entrepreneur has an idea that is designed to help families stay clean and save money.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Two recent MBA graduates believe they have the next big business idea; a "Ski Limo" pitch promises to chauffeur non-skiers down the slopes; and an entrepreneur with natural first aid products is looking for a serious investment from the Dragons.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The show begins on a high note with an idea for amusement park rides; an entrepreneur tries to sell the Dragons on a special brand of bottled water; and a business that caters to small-sized uniforms has the Dragons wondering if less is more.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A hopeful entrepreneur enters the Den with cheeky underwear; a new shower idea has the Dragons thinking about safety first; and things heat up in the Den when an entrepreneur pitches a new spin on cook stoves.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The Dragons get a pitch for a hi-tech billboard; an entrepreneur tries to convince the Dragons there's big business in custom-made pet products; and the Dragons are presented with a creepy-crawly business idea for life-sized mobile haunted houses.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: In this special encore presentation of the premiere episode of DRAGONS’ DEN, an exercise machine has the Dragons lacking motivation; a tidal energy bridge gets a dose of reality; and two entrepreneurs enter the Den to a pitch their magnetic gift card idea to the Dragons. Plus an idea for organic flax oil dressing makes the Dragons hungry for more.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The Dragons catch up with some of the most unforgettable entrepreneurs from the first season.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The season premiere of Dragons' Den features a new dragon, Calgary entrepreneur Arlene Dickinson; a guy with a device that creates six-pack abs, and business ideas that include bikinis, bananas and giant indestructable bags.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The Dragons take down a young entrepreneur with just a dream and a bunch of friends who believe in him. And they take on pro-wrestlers with an idea to make money off live events; Plus, a small business idea that sparks a big fight among The Dragons.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A prolific inventor with bags and bags of products gets a fiery message from the Dragons; a brother-sister team hopes to get a "sweet" deal with their Calgary teashop; plus a lumberjack trying to save marriages one board game at a time, and a 10-year old boy with a "small" idea that's "big" on potential.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The Dragons have an electrifying showdown with an aggressive entrepreneur, an innovative new water bottle that leaves the dragons thirsty for more, and one businessman takes it all off for the money. Plus screaming babies, dirty doggies, and a cure for the common cold that sends chills down The Dragons' spines.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A sexy spice peddler makes a desperate plea to the Dragons; a self-proclaimed math whiz challenges the Dragons NOT to give him money and one entrepreneur who's hoping to bring some glam and glitter into the office. Plus, a pitch about weapons sparks a heated debate about business ethics.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: An arrogant young entrepreneur makes a bet that Arlene is wrong; a fishing game that starts a bidding war among the Dragons; and a new take on the old pizza box, the Dragons are hoping to clean-up with. Plus homemade dog treats, custom-made blue jeans and a cure for hot flashes that leaves the Dragons cold.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: A high-energy entrepreneur skates circles around the Dragons; an underground fortune that requires major digging; and a business that goes to the dogs. Plus a racy underwear idea that has the dragons squirming.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The Prime Minister's personal chef helps two brothers trying for a sweet deal. The Dragons take down a young mother's idea to connect with family and friends; And new twist on the classic traffic pylon.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: An organized young woman charms The Dragons with her drive and determination; An 82-year-old inventor sings for his supper and his snow shovel; And an entrepreneur who can't seem to get his spring water business flowing. Plus catch-up with some of this season's most memorable entrepreneurs: what happened after The Den.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: A Christmas tree stand with one-hand setup; an on-demand email security system; and edible treats to fool horses into taking their medicine.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The season premiere of Dragons' Den features a new dragon, wealthy philanthropist and maverick investment banker, Brett Wilson; along with some energetic entrepreneurs, a dog that wants to be famous, and a golf shoe that sparks an aggressive bidding war. Pitches include: Fit 2 Touch, Bee Gone, Hybrid Backpack, KickSpike, Kuli Kuli, The Litter House, Pizza Pak, Softshell Computers and Wrinkles.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The Dragons are torn between a superior pitcher and his inferior idea, and an acrobatic pitch by an aerial artist has Kevin showing his devilish side. Plus, A+ software for teachers, a better way to Roll up the Rim, and the Canadian sombrero. Pitches Include : Aerial Angels, Canada Caps, Curling Stones, E-Student, Lipstixx, ePawn World, Rim Roller, AFAST Supertank.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A husband and wife duo has the dragons breathing fire with their spicy BBQ sauce; two mom-preneurs hope to make life easier with their time-saving inventions. Plus, the dragons get steamed up over hot dogs, anti-freeze, and a secret system for parking tickets. Pitches Include: Amphibicraft, Back Buddie, Bubbie's Best, Eco Anti Freeze, Quicksnap, Buster Rhino, Ski and Skate, Steemee Wonder.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: An army of working women storm the den for a powerful pitch, The Dragons junk an idea for cleaning shopping carts. Plus reading aids, beauty-tainment, and The Dragons take a bite out of the snack business. Pitches Include: Hardbite Chips, Janestrap, Manicures and Martinis, Moxie Trades, Pristine Cart, Tidy Trailers, Walk and Roll, Whale Tail.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: An eager entrepreneur tries to woo the dragons into the wine business; a pair of BFFs share their big plans for the plus-size industry, and a father-son duo pitch their multi-purpose caskets. Plus, golf gadgets, dazzling diamonds, and the dragons go Hollywood. Pitches Include: data Sentinel, My Date With Hugh, Explosion Bottlecap, Golf Treadz, Hillberg & Berk Jewelry, Maximum Woman, Rigo Recycler, Walker Hall Winery.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: A former pro wrestler pitches an innovative barbell system; a florist wants to grow his blossoming flower business. Plus, the dragons diss a positive energy proposal, a little genius sells teaching tools, and a fashionable way to discard dog do do. Pitches Include: Attitube, Bottled Intentions, Hyboo, I Look Like You, Poopysak, Powered Clothesline, Teach My Toddler, What a Bloom.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: An inventor with a history of bad luck changes his fortunes; a sleep-aid sets off the dragons' alarms; and giving the boot to a sexy business proposal. Plus, a young inventor's futuristic vehicle revs things up. Pitches Include: Anti-Snore, Creative Hair, Easy Hitch, Got Ass?, HouseKey, JB Wand, Jewels for His Crown, Uno.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: One Dragon dishes out the dough for a good night's sleep; a pair of competitive ballroom dancers can't find their rhythm in The Den. Plus, Robert makes a sweet offer that leaves a sour taste in Jim's mouth. Pitches Include: Admit An Attraction, Creo Mundi, Dancescape, Essentia, London Topic, Moyer Candy Apples, Swish Net, Wooden Jerseys.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: An encore pitch from last season's epic inventor, a chilly invention turns up the heat, and an eco-invention melts The Dragons' frosty exterior. Plus, yummy mummys, macaroons and marijuana. Pitches Include: Collella Dad, EcoTraction, K-Trak, Pacifier Puppies, Puckmasters, Sleep A Roo, Tranquility Wellness, Vangook Vs. Paintwell.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: The Den goes green with a frenzy of eco-preneurs: golf tees with a twist, cutlery that slices through Kevin's critique, and more. Plus; musical games, magical numbers, and moonshade blinds. Pitches Include: Aspenware, Bandthology, Dirtees, Echostone, Grow Zorb, Moonshade Blinds, Pet Deli, Win the Lottery.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: What do mosquitoes, babies, defibrillators, power plants and enchiladas have in common? A lot of cash! The Dragons get generous during the holidays with almost 3 million dollars in deals in just one episode! Plus: the magic event of the season, and one Dragon makes Santa's naughty list. Pitches Include: Cliche, Hand 2 Hand, Illusions Dinner Theatre, JASON Calendar, JC Latin Taste, Lump O' Coal, Magnacoasters, Brick School Math Game, Mosquito Shield, First Memories Photobooth, Rescue 7.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: All 5 dragons are back - and they're fired up for Dragons' Den's hottest season yet. In the premiere episode, students strip down to their skivvies, Kevin upgrades a travel website, and the dragons get feisty over a cash-for-gold business. Pitches include: Breast Rest, Deer Call Bracket, GoldNetworkCanada.com, Mistura Beauty, Naked, Nit Nannies, P Wipes, Travel Acquaintance.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Twins with their line of lip gloss deliberate an offer; a husband and wife duo receive an icy response from the Dragons; and an eco-friendly clothing line parades through the den. Plus a board game inventor hopes to score a deal but gets off-sided by Kevin. Pitches include: Aerial Angels, Rim Roller, Balmshell, The Doubler, Ebesse Zozo Hot Sauce, Freeze N' Snip, Land of Anne, Modrobes, The Permanent Canadian Flag, Soccer Board Game.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A dance troupe really shakes things up; a hefty bank loan has an entrepreneur begging for cash; and a tattoo biz raises temperatures. Plus, from a miner’s seat to retro chic, it’s lunchtime in the Den. Pitches include: Air Flow Dryer, Arabesque, Cavena Nuda, Hide-A-Can, Miners Lunchbox, Soak, Tattoo Preview, Water-Easy.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: From entrepreneur to employee, a casino dealer considers a Dragon offer; a medical marijuana business ignites some moral mediation and stickers that will scare you safe. Plus, angry cell-phone users mob the den looking for a better deal. Pitches include: Pristine Cart, Canada's Medicinal Marijuana Store, Fortune Teller Card Game, G-Couch, Knobkins, MyCellMyTerms.com, Scared Safe Driving Stickers, Smart Chess, Tan On The Run.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Hopeful entrepreneurs look to turn dough into dollars; a burgeoning bra business garners support from Arlene; and the dragons get all shook up as Elvis impersonators invade the Den. Plus, a bear bin takes a beating and reality TV show rejects attempt redemption. Pitches include: Yummy Dough, 9to5 Bra, The Bin 120, Canadian Body Painting Championships, Helmet Tech, Luke & Jock Productions, Mobile Process Service, Pro Elvis Jumpsuits.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: All aboard, next stop, the Den! The dragons go for a ride on a new-fangled snowboard; an all-female auto repair shop ignites trouble with Jim; and a table hockey game receives a much needed reality check. Plus, watch the dragons push, kick and twist their way into shape. Pitches include: All in Sports Entertainment Inc., Fazzari Push-up Machine, Kix 4 Chix, Ms. Lube, Platform Technology, Schmotoboard, ScribbleLive, Techno Logic.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Tune in for this special edition of Dragons' Den where we get a blast from the past. See what some of our most memorable entrepreneurs have been up to since their experience in the Den. Plus, hear what the Dragons have to say about the deals, disasters, and the ones that got away.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Turning crustaceans to cash, an aggressive offer makes two fishermen greedy; a DJ school has Arlene spinning a track; and the gloves are off in the Den. Plus, a single mom turns to tears over her fitness show for toddlers. Pitches include: Moyer Candy Apples, Scratch Lab DJ Institute, Fitness On The Go, The Catwalk, Cat TV, Happy Healthy Pet, Dig It Handwear, Toddlerobics, Ocean Organics.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: A sparkly swimsuit business catches the attention of the Dragons; a holistic healer tries to be "at one" with the cash flow; and a website that promotes recycling gets trashed. Plus, Dragon doggy doppelgangers enter the Den. Pitches include: EcoTraction, Passion Fruit Designs, Grub Canada, Woofstock, Back-Pals, Northern Lights Wildlife Wolf Centre, Creepy Crawly Cooking, ClubRapCat.com, Higher Vibrations Wholistic Healing and Wellness.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Two young entrepreneurs look to spice up their pitch with a little skin, diamonds made from an unlikely source, and an unusual underwear company braves the Den. Plus, criminals, culture and a coin-toss wrapped into a board game extravaganza. Pitches include: Pet Deli, Ballbra, Euphoria Smoothies, Trader II, Scoundrels, Hole, Wheel of Life, Augenstern Diamonds, Vantage Wire.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: In this holiday edition of Dragons' Den a winter hat receives a warm reception; futuristic living goes up in smoke; and a familiar face braves the Den again. Plus, you're never too young to be in business with a Dragon. It may be cold outside, but it's still fiery in the Den. Pitches include: Yingle Stick, Illusions Dinner Theatre, Cosy Soles, Jewellery Tree, Omega Tree Saver, Let's Dance Board Game, Pook Toques, Aurora Castle Theme Park, Santa's Little Tree Saver.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: In this special edition of Dragons’ Den, three Canadian icons bring their wealth of expertise to unsuspecting entrepreneurs. A fashionista brings out her inner Dragon; a seasoned contractor is intrigued by a new tool; and a top home designer who is willing to put her own name on the line. Pitches include: Erica Giuliani, Fixin' Vixens, Kelvin.23, Hazard Prevent Circuit Interrupter, Peashooter Tools, Oliberte.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: A sauce business makes Den history; a spray that packs a bang for its buck and a dress that provokes Dragon disagreement. Plus, two lifelong friends have Kevin playing to a different tune this week. Pitches include: The Alberta Flying Laughing Stock, Gockey, Buy It Now Button, MacKenzie & Marr Guitars, HiMac Research, The Maggie Dress, CanLets Time Bank, Sisters Secret Gourmet Foods.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: The Dragons aren't feeling "at one" with a mobile spa business, but they can't wait to get their hands on a new computer mouse; and helmet covers that promote safety and style. Plus, the Dragons exchange some pillow talk. Pitches include: Bijan's Dream Cars, EZ Sleep Pillow, Sir Mobile Spa, Virtual Outdoor Adventures, Tail Wags Helmet Covers, Dr. Mist, Oil, Sand & Water Separator, Air Mouse.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: The Banana Guard doctors return with a sure fire way to rescue the rest of the fruit basket; a game that will reveal your true self; and an organic juice business that gives the Dragons a taste of green. Plus, an entrepreneur who plans to litigate his way to millions. Pitches include: Garden Gate Farms, Two Cents Protractor, Yo Mama Gear, Froot Guard, If You Had To Choose, Cellbound Corporation, Driveway Leveler, Keep Canada Slim.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: A diaper service that makes sure nothing goes to waste; a family who hopes a Dragon heavyweight will help them mass-market their new scale; and a boating business that needs to reel in an investment. Plus, a mailbox pitch goes postal. Pitches include: Happy Nappy Diaper Service, Golf Unleashed, Sydenex, Quantum Scales, Posilight, Models & Moguls, Logo Locs, The Zingy.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: The Dragons are treated to dessert in hopes that they dish out a deal; a modern fix for a campfire favourite gets roasted; and a condom that will keep both you and the environment safe. Plus, a board game that has real potential, but will it be left at the altar? Pitches include: Take Me To The Cleaners, The Movie Palace, TrackItBack, Octorod, Tri-Sis Underwear, Glyde Vegan Condoms, Inside S'mores, The Happy Baker.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: All five dragons go in on a million dollar offer; an eco-friendly business is willing to give it all up; and a hotel check-in business that doesn't have any clientele. Plus, a puppy harness that ends in a puddle. Pitches include: Petzpac, Privacy Wrap, Epixome, Momzelle, Check In Whiz, Earthen Trading, Tai Chi Chef, UseMyBank.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: A pitch powers up to the tune of 1.5 million dollars; a recession fighting rock business; and a premium vodka business dances for dollars. Plus the biggest deal in Dragons' Den history. Pitches include: Power Pedal Technology, Satan: Christianity's Other God, Quemeez, Wee Piggies and Paws, Hope Rocks, Slava Vodka, Swing Wizards, Insect Defend Patch.

episodes.name: Episode 20 The Road to Riches : Dragons' Den Season 5 Season Finale
episodes.overview: "The Road to Riches" is an in-depth look at the Dragons' journeys to self-made success. From humble beginnings and darker days, to the joys of personal and professional milestones, this distinctive finale reveals the Dragons like never before.

episodes.name: Episode 21: Greenvention Show
episodes.overview: On this special episode of Dragons' Den three of the best, brightest and greenest entrepreneurs present their business ideas to the Dragons, but only one will walk away with $100,000 courtesy of SunChips, and the title of Canada's top eco-preneur.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In the premiere episode the Dragons get the ball rolling with an inflatable toy; a textbook rental service gets schooled; and a waffle business that leaves you wanting seconds. Plus watch a toilet pitch dissolve right in front of the Dragons. Pitches include: Wannawafel, Dr. Pearson's Wonderful Toy Company, Magzy's Kettle Corn, Seymour Dog Umbrella, Moar Books, SSS Venture International, Damn Heels, Wow Ball.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The Dragons put in an offer on a group buying website; a game that has the Robert and Brett bumping around the board; and a brother and sister duo who may need to throw out the baby with the bath water. Plus a cookie business that proves mother knows best. Pitches include: Teambuy.ca, Pirate Chips, Hypnotic Journeys, Malk Farms & Ranch, Bathtime Buddy, Icon Wheelchairs, Bumpin' Die T, Tickle Your Tummy Nut Free Cookie Company.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A little drama helps to sell a business; a juice jug that's ready to stir things up; and a chair company that brings a splash of colour to the Den. Plus things get messy when the Dragons rip into a diaper business. Pitches include: Easy Padala, Kannikin Pet Products, C.R. Plastic Products, Multipurpose Tool Balancer, EcoBumz, Lobster Branding Machine, Tip Alert, Juice Jug.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: A fairy tale that brings hope to germaphobic travelers; a communication tool that combines the old and the new; and two innovative bathroom solutions. Plus, a locally grown berry that has an entrepreneur thinking global. Pitches include: Prairie Berries, Snugabell Mom and Baby Gear, Checker Pool, Unisex Urinal, The Fenis, Fax To Email, ZeoGreen, CleanStay.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A man who believes he has the cure for sleepless doggie nights; a new hand sanitizer business gets slimed; and a few fuzzy friends stop by the Den. Plus, a visit from Canadian icon Don Cherry - or at least a look-a-like. Pitches include: Domo Tea, Mathopoly, The Walk of Life, Rim Bidet, Gurutropolis, Side Splitting Productions, Flu Goo, The Cute And Cuddly Corner.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: A trio hopes the Dragons put investing in them on their bucket list; a handy invention is put to the test; and a drinking device sparks some friendly competition. Plus, a weight loss company encounters heavy criticism. Pitches include: Beba Bean Designs, The Farties, High Heel Appeal, Bottle Throttle, Professional Weight Loss Services, AgriConnect, Handi-Tray, Elite Living International.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: A father-son duo brings monster size excitement to the Den; a breakfast cereal feeds a bidding frenzy; and a clothing business gets disheveled. Plus, a skin care line softens up the Dragons. Pitches include: Olivier Soap, Skyler Clothing, Cocky Willy, Slam Dunk, Internet Curling Club, Bucking Bronco, Holy Crap, Quickplant.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Two entrepreneurs look to revitalize their strained business; a new puzzle has the Dragons racing to make an offer; and a memorable visit from the king of rock 'n' roll. Plus, see if an anti-aging supplement wrinkles under pressure. Pitches include: str8ts, Bottle Cap BBQ, Lilly & Lace Lingerie, Yogakayak, Easy Strain Cookware, Elvis Presley, AGEOFF, Maid to Order.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: A filtered water business makes a splash in the Den; a delivery service that has even the postman blushing; and a small bathroom product that plans to make a big difference. Plus, will a scooter business crash and burn or cruise to a deal? Pitches include: Yukon Smoked Salmon, Shower Skin, The Automatic, Energy Restoring Footpad, Toilet Paper Saver, Electric Nolet Scooter, Panty By Post, Q water.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Tune in to a special edition of Dragons' Den to see if the Dragons are feeling generous this holiday season. A filmmaker delivers his idea for a new film; a new board game sparks some Dragon cheer; and an easy light storage solution brightens the Den. Pitches include: Breast Friends, Gift Card Danglers, Stovepipe Dressing, Tactico, Syllables, Mother Earth Essentials, LiteLocker, The Deliverance of Christmas.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Dragons' Den returns with a special "Second Chance" edition, where several lucky entrepreneurs from seasons past are given another chance to score a deal. Their strategy may change, but the stakes never do. If they don't get it right this time they walk away empty-handed, again. Pitches include: Garden Gate Farms, Croatia Property Investments, Synchrohearts, Soak, Use My Bank, Vaccu-trim, Sap World, Oliberte.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Dried honey products are abuzz in the Den; a kitchen gadget inventor who has put it all on the line; and language software that hopes to have the Dragons signing in. Plus, it's a musical day in the Den.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: An inventor puts a new spin on riding a bike to work; laundry detergent that's good for the environment; and a tradeshow that'll make you look twice. Plus, will a hockey musical have the Dragons singing praises or spitting fire? Pitches include: Frogbox, Shake Rattle & Paddle, Gawker Stopper, Sexapalooza, Buy Soap Nuts, Spin-O-Rama, Suitsak.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: An eco-friendly idea springs a few leaks; a health conscious couple hopes the Dragons become obsessed with their business; and a shipping container full of potential. Plus, a mother of five has a snappy idea. Pitches include: 3twenty Solutions, Scrap Science, All People In Motion, The Rak-Coop, Obzest, Snappy Socks, Liquid Express, SoloStrength Fusion.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: A new truck gadget has the Dragons rolling out offers; a stock trading board game gets dumped; and a barbershop with an appealing offer. Plus, a socially conscious perfume that brings the Dragons to tears. Pitches include: 7 Virtues, Trans Canada Trailer Company, ROX, Snik Stix, Barracuda Security Device, MAG-ROLL-UP, Andie's Barbershop, Daytrader.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: A desperate duo begs the Dragons for cash; a new set of wheels cruises into the Den; and a takeout food container receives a harsh review. Plus, a pitch for a new television series gets a reality check. Pitches include: HTT Pléthore Supercar, Flex Max, Rollerblade Eze, Wild Kingdom Erotic Luxury, The American Heroes, Pixie Glassworks, The Carry-Out Picnic Box, Seaforth Rain Gear.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: A new game of hockey has the Dragons turning in circles; a DVD that will keep golfers playing nice on the green; and one size fits all pants. Plus, will an electric boat reel in a Dragon? Pitches include: Infinyte Marine, Xtreme Pro Racer, Green Bidet, Decorado, Better Golf Through Golf Etiquette DVD, Ilumati, Vitockey, Siams Pants.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: A pitcher sweats it outs when the Dragons turn up the heat; a novelty item looks to Kevin for an endorsement; and a tasty snack in search of a healthy investment. Plus, fighting it out for the Dragons attention. Pitches include: Armageddon Fighting Championships, The Pooh-In-One, YouMyTwitFace.com, Boxxxers, Dynamic Lawyers, Rugged Man, Oi Furniture, Tasty Cheese.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: An entrepreneur plans to franchise her poop and scoop business; an eco-friendly gift that will grow on you; and eyewear to match your every look. Plus, a gadget that will make sure you're never caught speeding again. Pitches include: Evergreen Memories, Quadricycle, Environmental Litter Innovation, Tribute Caskets, Anti Photo Radar Club, Flush20, 1-888-K9SCOOP, Swap Eyewear.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: On this season finale--the dragons battle it out over some of the best ideas ever brought to the den: including, a new marketing tool to keep you glued to the screen; a mask that keeps the germs away; and homebuilding with a twist. Plus, the one-stop-shop for ethical products. Pitches include: Ethical Ocean, Mascare, The Skrapr, SuperSales Tag, Karoleena Custom Homes, Powerdent.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In the season premiere a towel that has the Dragons all wrapped up; an all-natural practitioner gets a dose of reality; and a coffee company needs a jolt to expand their business. Plus a water idea makes the Dragons thirsty for more. Pitches include: Chawel, Thomas Compact Herbal First-Aid Kit, Balzac's Coffee Roasters, CashSender.com, Superjoe, Patches, American Football Darts, Event Water Solutions.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: An opera performance starts the Den out on a high note; a jerky business gives the Dragons something to chew on; and a racy line of novelty products heats up the Den. Plus a new way to cash in on unwanted gifts. Pitches include: Lime Slicing Machine, Mercury Opera, Winfall, Personal Pool, CardSwap.ca, B.K.H. Jerky, 4Play Creative, Nordixx Nordic Pole Walking.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: School is in when the Dragons are taught the importance of an easy day; a musical about bullying targets the Den; and a shocking invention takes the headache out of investing. Plus a celebrity chef tries to cook up a deal. Pitches include: Cefaly Migraine Device, Ontario's Own, Winsectrap, Mute: A Musical, Franbrewski Distributing (Pourin' Star), Easy Daysies, Forever Free Hearse, Gamma-Ray Boosters.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: A pet website meets its match in the Den; the Dragons wrestle with an entertaining idea; and an online magazine hopes to hook up with an investment. Plus the Dragons get carried away by a Bottle Bin. Pitches include: Flirts Magazine, MatchMaker Pet, Petports, Hart Bros Wrestling, Floorcare Buddy, Bottle Bin, North American Card Solutions, Scufflinks.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A new fitness ball rolls into the den; a foam saver has the Dragons in a lather; and a line of men's underwear bares it all for the chance at a deal. Plus a waterless car wash hopes to clean up with the Dragons. Pitches include: Dylan Ribkoff Underwear, Go Clean, Twirl-Go-Round, UGI Fitness, Zone In Programs, Hitting Matters, Shave N' Save, Oyster Jim.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: A student stockbroker trades school hours for market hours; a 17-year-old Formula Tour racer drives a hard bargain; and a young pair creates headwear with earphones that are really out of sight. Plus these students hope the Dragons will jump on the note-taking bandwagon. Pitches include: Heads Up, Notewagon.com, The Curse of the Holiday Head Lice, Nud Fud, Battlefield Boardgame, He-Sheets, I for E Mini, Nathan Blok Racing.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: A smoked meat business on wheels rolls into the Den; a racy pitch gets the Dragons dancing; and a housing idea tries to take home a deal. Plus history comes alive in the Den with Vintage Sports Images. Pitches include: Room and Boardroom, Vintage Sports Images, MooseDar, The Law Offices, Dog Aims, Caplansky's Deli, Juice Loose, Pole Fit.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: A fashion show on all fours strolls into the Den; the Dragons crunch the numbers on a flax deal; and a golf jacket tightens up the game. Plus Australian sports instructors have the Dragons teaming up. Pitches include: Neo-Paws, Caps Game, Slixer Dinner Theatre, Omega Crunch Flax, Swing Jacket, Aussie X, Wes Misener, Freida Anti-Aging Skincare.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: A gym idea is looking for action in the Den; a golf pitch tries for a hole in one; and a yoga teacher hopes to charm the Dragons with her line of raw food snacks. Plus a better designed crutch leans on the Dragons for a little support. Pitches include: Smittens, Lyoness, Green Gym, WalkEze, Sunshine Living Foods, Cygnet Better Golf System, Sidestix, Airball.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: A dual-purpose bag dresses up for the Den; the Dragons learn freedom is more valuable than money; and a realtor website tries to close a deal. Plus one pitcher fights back against Dragon attacks. Pitches include: Beautifulbrides.ca, Food Scrooge, Idiot Stickers, Dressed N' Case, Realty Sites Plus, Price of Freedom, Charming Bidet.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Holiday wrapping meets its match; a new seasonal light dazzles the Dragons; and it's Hockey Night in the Den with an original sporty belt. Plus a holiday treat keeps things neat. Pitches include: The Original Hockey Lace Belt, Octino, Gluke, All In One Giftwrapper, Liquid Hot Chocolate, Retrofestive, Rare Earth Chemical Element Card Game, Yumalite.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: A men's underwear line is back with a cheekier pitch; a helmet wrap recovers from its last appearance; and a dog festival is now fit for a Dragon. Plus a second chance leads to a first in the Den for one all-natural Soap Company. Pitches include: Wrinkles, Luke & Jock, Woofstock, Olivier, Platform Technology, Naked, Tail-Wags.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: An exercise aid creates tension in the Den; high rollers gamble for the chance at a deal; and a convenient fresh idea for the Dragons to snack on. Plus a massage franchise could have just the right touch. Pitches include: Chuck 'Em Casino Game, Massage Addict, Ringz, Urban Vendor, Travel Roller, Touchy, Apple Cheeks Diapers, Canadian Solar Financing Corp.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: A hotdog chef gets frank with the Dragons; a spectator garment is hoping for some fans in the Den; and a fashion fix gets caught in a sticky situation. Plus a homegrown idea that could blossom into a thriving business. Pitches include: Kick-Off, Miss Fix Fashion, Urban Cultivator, Pick N' Choose, Fanny Wrap, Fabulous Furballs, DougieDOG, Auto Glide Ride Thru.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: A group of entrepreneurs are putting up their own barriers in the Den; a shakable pancake powder mixes things up; and a clean pitch gets a little messy. Plus a specialty clothing line tries to net a Dragon deal. Pitches include: Chillbeds, Laundry Detergent Machine, Rejection Therapy, Jitterbee, Squito Wear, Move It To Lose It, Patty Wacker, Barrier 2 Go.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Magnets are the secret to flower power in the Den; a small-scale business is looking for healthy growth; and it's Ladies' Night every night at a hunky hero-themed restaurant. Plus a candy company is hoping for a sweet victory in the Den. Pitches include: Whiz-Bang Advertising, Crowdfanatic.com, OMG Candy, Ab-Solution (BodyGood), Mom's Healthy Secrets, Bout Buddy, Lipsticks & Dreams, Monster Basher.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Tune in for a special edition of Dragons' Den and catch up with past pitchers. See what some of the most memorable entrepreneurs have been up to, and discover the Dragons' Den effect. Plus, the Dragons reflect on their deals and relive some of the disasters.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: The Dragons are introduced to the friend-zone; a nutrient-rich powder tries to benefit the Dragons' wallets; and a ski mask gets masculine. Plus a natural alternative to other artificial sweetners enters the Den. Pitches include: Stroll-Air, Krisda, Whenisgarbageday.com, K9 Pic-A-Poo, Just Bounce, Beardo, BioFlavia, FriendMatch.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: A toilet accessory needs a flush of Dragon cash; a hockey website tries to net a deal; and a web-based shop says it has every occasion wrapped up. Plus a West Coast diver needs a lot of clams to keep his business alive. Pitches include: Geoduck, Boingy Boingy, Cigar Box Guitars, Godson, Occasion Giftware, PlayingUpHockey.com, My VENTEX, uKloo.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: The Dragons find out what's smart in branded phone casings; a water dispenser soaks up some offers; and a home improvement invention impresses. Plus a hangover cure gets a shot at a deal. Pitches include: HomeSav.com, 3D Sawhorse Bracket, Last Call, AquaOvo, Smart Casing.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: On the season finale, Dianne and the Dragons reflect on six incredible seasons in the Den. The Dragons watch themselves get fired up over deals, and they'll dish on the ones that crashed and burned. They'll tell us what they really think about each other. And things heat up all over again when the Dragons re-visit some of the racier pitches. Plus viewers and producers pick the three moments in Dragons' Den history.

episodes.name: Future Now Energy Innovation Special
episodes.overview: In an exciting special episode of Dragons' Den, the dragons will see three energy innovations compete for $100,000 in prize money from Shell.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In the season premiere the Dragons enjoy a spot of tea; unlucky entrepreneurs take another chance at making their business stick; and a pair of brothers are tired of living out of their luggage. Plus, a niche product has the Dragons stepping out of their comfort zone.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: A distillery business hopes the Dragons will take a shot at an investment; a posture perfectionist tries to set the Dragons straight; and a yard work tool causes a Dragon showdown. Plus a pitcher takes flight in the Den, with hopes of shredding the competition.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The Dragons let loose and kick off their shoes; a beauty business spoils the Dragons; and a realty business isn't afraid to bare it all. Plus, an apparel company brings a breath of fresh air into the Den. Pitches include: Aspen Railway Crossing, NakedRealty.ca, Yuk Yuk's Humour On Hold, Ten Tree Apparel, Scary Kitty Designs, BeautyGram, Wizof.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Small town sisters hoping for a big investment in their tasty business; the Dragons are invited to a new kind of party; and a crafty entrepreneur enters the Den with her paper-mache prototype. Plus, a pair of pitchers give the Dragons a run for their money with a little friendly competition. Pitches Include: StoveMinder, Back Seat Driver, Slingbackers, Portable Bidet Honey Wash, Gel N' Bath, The Halfy Birthday Celebration, Three Farmers Camelina Oil.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: The Dragons enjoy a few martinis; the gloves are off in the Den; and a Dragon swing goes out of bounds fast. Plus, a new form of school fundraising raises some eyebrows.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The Dragons go toe to toe with a young entrepreneur; it's quiz time in the Den; and a small entrepreneur with a big heart shows the Dragons how a good deed goes a long way. Plus an exclusive concert in the Den.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The Dragons cuddle with a few furry friends; a battle for the best burger in the Den; and automobile accessory the Dragons aren't sure will stick. Plus, a designer fashion show in the Den for a fraction of the price.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: A unique exercise causes the Dragons to break a sweat; things get dirty in the Den; and a family business looks for a big investment. Plus, a snapshot into a memorable market.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Things are heating up in the Den; a tasty pitch results in a dental emergency; and we catch up with a feathered friend from earlier this season. Plus, a helmet innovation makes an impact on the Dragons.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: A winter tool attachment comes to the Den for a little leverage; a redesigned holiday classic attempts to dazzle the Dragons in a new fashion; and a hot money game is looking for a cold cash deal. Plus a toy maker tries to sleigh the Dragons with his line of action figures.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: A Toronto deli drives its way back into the Den; a tanning business from seasons past leaves a Dragon turning red again; and an entrepreneur from Season 1 hopes this time the Dragons will see eye-to-eye with his idea. Plus, a fast food idea comes back for seconds. Vote on the Second Chance pitches to win a Dragons' Den prize pack.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: The Dragons put their fitness skills to the test; a franchise opportuntiy spins a few wheels and the largest ask ever drops Dragon jaws.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: A highly entertaining performance is served up to the Dragons; things get up close and personal in the Den; and a multimillion dollar valuation has the Dragons spinning their wheels. Plus; a food topping that needs a boost from the Dragons.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: A bright young duo tries to charm with their trinkets; a children's software schools the Den; and a paper packing company makes the Dragons think outside of the box. Plus an office compost service needs a Dragon investment to grow.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: A new showerhead system hopes to avoid being put in hot water; a targeted dating site looks for a Dragon partner; and a chocolate bar wakes up the Den. Plus a Canadian Classic gets a meaty spin.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: A baby product prevents a big mess in the Den; an energy idea needs Dragon dollars to help it grow; and the Dragons are given a few words of encouragement. Plus; a handy entrepreneur hopes to lock in a deal.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: An entrepreneur serves up a snack fit for a king; an artist hopes her body of work will win over the Dragons; and a food entrepreneur hopes to bag a deal. Plus; a Guinness World Record holder attempts to escape the Den with investment.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: A detox delivery business look for a natural partner; an artist hopes her Disney dream doesn't turn into a nightmare; and married entrepreneurs hope to make the most of a golden opportunity. Plus; a pepper spray entrepreneur hopes he doesn't fend off an investment.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: A new step in the world of women's footwear; eyeglass entrepreneurs hope the Dragons will flip for their product; and a bicycle innovation hopes to wheel out of the den with a deal. Plus, the Dragons get revved up over a ride share business.

episodes.name: Episode 20 - Year of the Dragons
episodes.overview: The Dragons' Den season finale delves into the public and private lives of our very own Dragons. We followed them for an entire year to discover what it takes to be a Dragon. It's an intimate portrait of the balancing act between their hectic lives running business empires and spending time with families. Along the way, we learn their secrets of success and how to avoid some of the mistakes they made in the pursuit of power.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The season premiere reveals a brand new Den. Plus, a snack company has its numbers crunched; the Dragons get a feel for a denim company; a couple pitches a solution to a rather delicate problem; and a technology company hopes to get their product out of infancy.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A six-figure ask leaves the Dragons feeling flushed, a demonstration comes to a smashing halt, and a silent skit causes confusion in the Den. Plus, a fit pitch hopes to spike some Dragon interest.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: An established business tries to wheel a deal; a pitcher horses around in the Den; a tasty treat sparks a bidding war. Plus, a men's shoe company tries to measure up to the Dragons' expectations.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A search for a deal is underway; when it rains in the Den, it pours; and a family favourite pleases the Dragons' taste buds. Plus, a team effort gets props in the Den.

8.name: Season 8
8.overview: The Dragons are back! But this time, it's a different den. Canada's highest-rated unscripted TV show returns with a brand new, ominous den. Each week, see entrepreneurs brave a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to face five multi-millionaires who have the cash and the know-how to catapult companies to commercial success. The competition is fierce as all five Dragons battle it out for the best business ideas in the country. Catch special episodes including a cheeky "all-Canadian" themed show, built around some of Canada's classic foods and pastimes. The season will also feature the fan favourite "Student Show," where the country's youngest entrepreneurs attempt to school the Dragons, and the highly anticipated "Update Special," where the Dragons will drop in on DRAGONS' DEN alumni to find out what life is like after the Den.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: An entrepreneur believes he can be an industry ringleader; a flashy product burns a Dragon.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: A family has a twist on tradition; cousins ride into the Den with bells on.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: A legendary creature appears in the Den; the Dragons are on edge over an adventurous business model.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Business partners demonstrate how they'll wipe away the competition.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Three friends hope to toast to a deal; two nurses hope the Dragons want in.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: A company asks for a shot; an entrepreneur presents his product.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: A company tries to scare the Dragons into a deal; an entrepreneur has a cap-in-hand presentation.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Celebrating the biggest deals of the season; the Dragons share their success secrets.

9.name: Season 9
9.overview: DRAGONS' DEN is back with two new Dragons! Restaurant magnate Vikram Vij and the reigning rock star of Canadian finance, Michael Wekerle, join the panel on Canada's top-rated entertainment show. Each week, entrepreneurs have a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to pitch their business idea to financiers with the cash and the know-how to catapult companies to commercial success.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Three new Dragons breathe fire into the Den. One tasty product line has the Dragons thirsty for a deal; tensions rise when a business bares it all; and two brothers hope the delivery of their pitch is enough to reach the Dragons.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The Dragons get help from a furry friend; a family's twist on a traditional treat; a graphic artist pitches her business; the Dragons decide if a product sinks or swims.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A product warms the Dragons' hearts and sparks a bidding war; a company puts one Dragon's gaming skills to the test; and an entrepreneur hopes the Dragons won't chicken out on investing in his product. Plus, a business hopes to inspire a bionic deal in the Den.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: A competitive company hopes its biggest player can help win over a deal in the Den. Plus, two friends think the best way to the Dragons' wallets is through their stomachs.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: An entrepreneur hopes to get one of the Dragons' hands dirty with a burly deal, and a company hopes a boys night out will help the Dragons' cheers to a deal.

episodes.name: Student Special
episodes.overview: A university student tries to spin a deal; two guests help a student school the Dragons; business partners don't want to be left in the dark; siblings turn up the heat and teach the Dragons not to underestimate students.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: An artist hopes to sing his way into the Dragons' hearts; partners present an enlightening demonstration; a trio must make a decision before their offer melts; business partners hope to team up with a Dragon.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: A food chain offers a twist on a Canadian classic; two friends hope a contest will score them a deal; a father and son aim to land a partner; a boxer tries to get a Dragon on his team.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: An entrepreneur discovers which Dragons are naughty or nice; brothers want to warm up cool attitudes; a company has special gifts for the Dragons.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: An entrepreneur gets back on the horse; a returning company thinks it can break a sweat in an out-of-shape market; a man brings his business back to the table; a team returns with a hardy opportunity.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: The Dragons battle it out; two parents try to woo the Dragons; a food chain offers a tasty proposition; an entrepreneur with a soothing solution.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: An entrepreneur has some slick moves; the Dragons are panicked after a puzzling pitch; a business plan with a few kinks; a company returns in the hope of scoring a home run.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: An entrepreneur hopes the Dragons will roll the dice; an inventor returns for an investment; a tourism company; a techpreneur gets a virtual-reality check.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: An entrepreneur hopes the Dragons will float her some cash; a paint innovator hopes for a smooth finish; the Den gets dressed up; a former hockey player hopes to score big.

episodes.name: Family Special
episodes.overview: A company's past is more than relative; a husband and wife duo present their products; sisters present their fashion line; a family's food concept presents the Dragons with a cut of the business.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: A business hopes their furry friend will bring out the Dragons' softer side; an entrepreneur sounds the alarms; two sisters try to skirt a business issue; a company turns up the volume in the Den.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: A business looks for a share of the Dragons' loot; an entrepreneur looks for a sweet deal; a company tries to get the Dragons to send them some money.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: An entrepreneur tries to wet the Dragons' appetites; a sports company hopes to cut a strong deal; a beauty business looks for a deal; a tidy entrepreneur thinks her business will stick.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: An entrepreneur cruises into the Den; a TV producer hopes for a green light on an offer; an athletic company tries to get the Dragons to be more flexible; a twist on a classic Canadian beverage.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: The Dragons see a colourful pitch; a business hopes to grow organically; a pet business tries to get a clean deal; a fitness pitch has the Dragons sweating.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Past and present Dragons share their favourite memories; looking back at the past 10 years of inspiring pitches by Canadian small businesses.

10.name: Season 10
10.overview:
A Canadian success story in its own right, DRAGONS' DEN is a show where good ideas get rewarded and bad ideas get burned, Canadian entrepreneurs and audiences have a front row seat to this country's top business leaders and risk-takers.

Each week, entrepreneurs have a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to pitch their business idea to financiers with the cash and the know-how to catapult companies to commercial success and audiences gain insights into how to make your dreams come true.

This season, three exciting new dragons joining the den: Joe Mimran, founder of Joe Fresh; Michele Romanow, cofounder of buytopia.ca, one of Canada's top daily deal sites; and Manjit Minhas, co-founder and co-owner of Minhas Breweries and Distillery.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A business hopes to leave the Dragons hungry for more; a product works to remove the stink in the Den; a family business hopes for a deal; a financial education platform needs serious interest from the Dragons.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: An entrepreneur breaks down more than just numbers; a designer hopes for a perfect pitch; a family with rich history hopes to get the Dragons seeing dollars; the Dragons receive a tasty proposition.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: In Season 11's Shop the Den Special, Hockey Dads think their product can go head-to-head against stiff competition; a company thinks it can flip the switch on a DIY market; and a unique business model has the Dragons believing it's a stroke of genius. Plus, a green product has some Dragons seeing red.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: A supplement company gets a dose of Dragon fire, a trio says they their app could spin the Dragons' investment into a significant net profit, and more!

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A fitness company puts the Dragons to the test, one of Joe Mimran's former fashion models looks to inspire an organic partnership, and more!

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Budding entrepreneurs pitch business ideas to multimillionaires. The Dragons try a fruity alternative to alcohol as well as trying out a campus clothing range.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Two graduates from Manchester offer a stake in their youth-orientated package holiday business, a Bulgarian inventor of a self-filling bath pitches for a colossal one million pounds and a 20-year-old entrepreneur from Essex wows the Dragons with an ingenious cure for water damaged mobile phones.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Overvalued pitches dominated this latest Dragons’ Den episode with a controversial proposition from the founder of a ‘custom made’ contraceptive solution raising eyebrows in the Den. However, minicabit founder Amer Hasan managed to turn it around with his taxi cab price comparison service which saw him take negotiations into his own hands.  Hasan managed to get two of the Dragon’s to revise their original offers to secure the only investment of the night.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: In Season 11's Holiday Special, a family decks the halls in the Den and serves up a hot offer; two entrepreneurs hope their festive presentation will get them off on the right foot; and inventors think their franchise will drive sales -- all the way to the snow banks. Plus, a married couple returns to the Den with bright hopes of getting everything on their wish list.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: In this Second Chance Special, a fantasy face-off in the Den has both Dragons and pitchers up in arms, a trio from the past enters the Den thirsty for second investment, and a re-evaluation of a business appraisal has the Dragons weighing their odds

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Budding entrepreneurs pitch business ideas to multimillionaires. The Dragons are left in the dark when a former marine presents his glow-in-the-dark sportswear brand.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: A company hopes some furry friends will help them catch a deal, a salesman tries his best to wheel and deal in the Den, and more!

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: n Season 11's Student Special, an East Coast entrepreneur says her business is a class above the competition, a duo teach the Dragons that age isn't an obstacle in the Den, and an all-girl trio hope to educate the market on an easier way to purchase feminine essentials

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview:
This week’s episode saw two investments for an interactive glow ink t-shirt brand and a beauty subscription box from an entrepreneur that Peter Jones described as one of the “most impressive” he’d seen in the Den”.

Elsewhere a serial inventor failed to excite the Dragons with his biodegradable cable tie solution while an intimate waxing business walked away with plenty of compliments but no funding.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: In Season 11's Family Special, a father and son hope the Dragons will get into the right head space to help turn their virtual dream into a reality, and more!

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: A business promises their fishy proposal won’t be hard to swallow, a hockey fanatic hopes to score a hat trick of deals, and entrepreneurs with a new invention hope the Dragons have the vision to see its value. Plus, an entrepreneur believes her mobile app will remedy a significant gap in the health industry.

11.name: Season 11
11.overview: DRAGONS' DEN is a show where aspiring entrepreneurs pitch their business concepts and products to a panel of Canadian business moguls who have the cash and the know-how to make it happen.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: This two-hour special features ten Canadian businesses hoping to score a deal with the Dragons.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: A company thinks it will be barking up the right tree with the help of a few celebrity endorsements, a trampoline studio seeks a strategic partner, and more!

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A strong couple powers their way through their pitch, kids gear up to bring safety to the Den and much more!

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: A tween author publishes an inspiring future, Waterloo students pitch their innovative health product which makes the Dragons skip a beat, and more!

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A couple of business partners pop the question to the Dragons, a brilliant inventor impresses the Den with his big idea, and more!

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: A guitarist plans to sync with the right Dragon to rock on a deal, a company thinks the Dragons will fall in love with their product after they sleep on it, and more!

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The Den honours Canadian heroes in the Heroes Special.

episodes.name: Holiday Special
episodes.overview: Special episode for the holiday season

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Entrepreneurs pitch their ideas to the Dragons.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Entrepreneurs pitch their ideas to the dragons

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Entrepreneurs pitch their ideas to the dragons.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Entrepreneurs pitch their ideas to the dragons

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Entrepreneurs pitch their ideas to the dragons.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Entrepreneurs pitch their ideas to the dragons.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Entrepreneurs pitch their ideas to the dragons.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Entrepreneurs pitch their ideas to the dragons.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Entrepreneurs pitch their ideas to the dragons.

12.name: Season 12
12.overview: Dragons' Den returns with fan favourite, Arlene Dickinson! This season sizzles with 20 dramatic episodes featuring six multi-millionaires who have the knowledge and experience to turn worthwhile ideas into incredible fortunes. Arlene Dickinson, Jim Treliving, Joe Mimran, Manjit Minhas, Michael Wekerle and Michele Romanow.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: An Entrepreneur hopes her success doesn't melt away.  Two siblings hope to frame an investment.  The creators of a social enterprise hope to reel in a deal. A team of scientists hopes the Dragons get fired up.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: A gym owner seeks a strategic partner to row his business to the top, a duo seeks investment for a pet product they hope the Dragons will eat up, and much more!

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: An inventive mother looks to show the Dragons she doesn’t make rash decisions, a company hopes the Dragons can stomach their business proposal, and more!

episodes.name: Behind the Scenes Special
episodes.overview: For the first time ever, Dragons’ Den pulls back the curtain to reveal the exciting inner workings of Canada’s favourite business show.

episodes.name: Up in Smoke Special
episodes.overview: Entrepreneurs enter the Den with hopes that the Dragons will cash in on Canada’s latest cash crop.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: An entrepreneur thinks love is blind, a caffeine product needs a Dragon boost and a duo hopes their pitch isn’t off key. Plus, business partners present their natural product against oil odds.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: An entrepreneur reveals the “tooth” about dental hygiene, a theatrical team aims to be the highlight of the show and more!

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: A discussion ignites competition between the Dragons, a father-son duo is thirsty for an investment, a toy accessory sparks the Dragons’ imaginations, and pet enthusiasts hope to bark up a money tree.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: The Side Hustle entrepreneurs leave behind their day jobs to show the Dragons they have the skills to make their passion a full time pursuit.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: A trio hopes to lure in an investment; a team hopes the Dragons will gush over their business; a family hopes their Den experience won’t be the tail end of their business; a group hopes to transform the furniture industry.

episodes.name: Holiday Special
episodes.overview: A group of entrepreneurs hopes to win over the Dragons’ inner Scrooges with winter-themed gear, meals, and stocking stuffers.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: An entrepreneur hopes to continue his success; a group seeks to fill some empty spaces; an entrepreneur hopes the Dragons will breathe new life into her invention; a trio presents its version of a tux.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: A couple has a fresh take on a juicy proposal, former athletes sock it to the Dragons, a team of aestheticians creates a hairy situation in the Den, and a hockey coach reveals a game-changing invention.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: A pro-snowboarder presents, an electrician believes a partnership would fit like a glove, and a duo believe their business is on target.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Triathletes pitch to the Dragons: an inventor hopes to plant a seed of investment, a mechanical engineer cleans up in the Den, and a duo presents its product.

episodes.name: Valentines Day Special
episodes.overview: The Dragons hope to see passionate pitchers and proposals.

13.name: Season 13
13.overview: DRAGONS' DEN offers audiences a front-row view as the country's top business moguls wheel and deal with entrepreneurs who dare to brave the Den. Hosted by Dianne Buckner, Season 13 will introduce two new Dragon investors, Lane Merrifield and Vincenzo Guzzo, joining Arlene Dickinson, Jim Treliving, Manjit Minhas and Michele Romanow in the Den.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: An adrenaline seeker hopes to kick off the season in an extreme way and a pair of friends look to show the Dragons their green thumb.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: A couple hopes to straighten out an investment; a salesman looks to the Dragons for support; and a duo brings some pizzazz to a stale industry. Plus, a husband and wife team look to roll out a deal.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: An athlete calls in recruits to help puncture the Dragons’ wallets, a trio look to redecorate the Den, an entrepreneur seeks some clean capital, and a father hopes to win over a Dragon with his dreamy product.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: A chocolate company hopes the Dragons get a sugar high, a mother and daughter team offer the Dragons a deal and a date, and more!

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Twinpreneurs hope to make waste a thing of the past and clothing the future, a student group looks to turn trash into Dragon treasure, and more!

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Business partners hope the Dragons will be intoxicated by the pitch they’ve brewed up, an entrepreneur looks to inspire the giving spirit, and more!

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: In this special episode, entrepreneurs shake up the Den by showing the Dragons their revolutionary ideas that are changing the game.

14.name: Season 14
14.overview: Dragons’ Den returns for its 14th season, heating up with the best in Canadian business and a collection of specials. The fan-favourite "Family Special" episode returns alongside two new emerging themes: “Upcycle” which showcases businesses that focus on a brighter future by reducing their carbon footprint; and “Disrupt-Den” featuring game-changing entrepreneurs looking to shake up their established industries.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: An inventor hopes to find her Dragon sole-mate; and two business partners give a refreshingly clean pitch. Plus, an entrepreneur pitches a business with some valuable material.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: In this episode, an entrepreneur serves the catch of the day to the Dragons, while another company is very invested in pitching to the Dragons.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A student hopes his invention will be après-ciated in the Den and one duo sends the Dragons a message they’ll never forget.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: In this episode, two friends strip away the stigma of a certain mens’ swimwear fashion. Two entrepreneurs approach their pitch gingerly, while one duo puts a new spin on an old skill. Plus, one company goes into overdrive to get the Dragons on their side.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: This week, two friends hope an investment in their sustainable product will leave them swimming in cash.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: In this episode, business partners look to smooth the bumps out of their pitch. Also an East Coast duo looks to mount a successful pitch.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: This week, a duo hits the sweet spot in the Den! Later, an entrepreneur calls on a familiar friend to help them out.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: In the season finale, sisters shower the Dragons with a fresh pitch. Also, an entrepreneur lets the good times roll with some catchy tunes. A mother has a pitch that’s almost tutu good to be true! Plus, an entrepreneur hopes he doesn’t get taken for granite.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: This week in the Den, a fitness duo looks to climb the ladder of success. Also, a fashion forward entrepreneur seeks investment to keep his brand in vogue.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: This week in the Den, a racer sets the pace for virtual events. Plus, a couple hopes the Dragons will help them ride a wave to success.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: An entrepreneur hopes the Dragons will flip for his flour. Also, an environmentalist looks to entertain with his recycling revenue; and a cat-lover hopes for a pawsitive reception.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: An entrepreneur hopes her business is a deal du jour; and an entrepreneur seeks a Dragon partner to help him hit the road. Plus, a couple looks to call it a wash in the Den.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: This week in the Den, an entrepreneur hopes his business is worth a tonne and a sibling duo look to harvest liquid assets from crabby Dragons.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: This week in the Den, a chiropractor looks to pump the Dragons for a deal. Plus, a couple looks to prove that where there’s a will there's a way.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: This week in the Den, siblings want the Dragons to let their inner child out. Plus, a journalist hopes to show the Dragons proof that she can roll out some major dough.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: This week in the Den, childhood friends look to impress the Dragons with their baggage. Plus, brothers hope to win the Dragons over piece by piece.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: This week in the Den, an entrepreneur wants to add a Dragon to his team. Plus, a husband and wife duo look for a Dragon partner to take their business from the ground up.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A former Dragon returns with more fire than ever and an entrepreneur aims to catch a deal for his seafood innovation. Also, a brother-sister duo hopes for an eye-deal investment; and a mompreneur sprinkles her charm. Plus, two friends rev up their engines and spill their master plan to the Dragons.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: A team of plant lovers grows on the Dragons; an ultralight backpacker proves that there’s no timeline on entrepreneurship; and cousins touch on the importance of family.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Two maritimers try to sell the Dragons on their sparkling supply; a set of entrepreneurs promise to pump up more than the Dragons wallets; and a teacher turned business owner is a fish out of water. Plus, a group of friends are ecstatic to show the Dragons their briefs.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: A duo hopes to cut through the red tape and secure a deal with the Dragons; two entrepreneurs may need more than an asking price if they want a Dragon to buy in; and a married couple is determined to not let this opportunity go to waste. Plus, a former French teacher hopes the way to a Dragons’ heart is through their stomach.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: A mother sets up shop and parks herself in the Den. Also an entrepreneur has something in store for the Dragons; a student hopes the Dragons don’t chill his assets and a familiar face hopes for a saucy comeback.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: A married couple plays the numbers game and counts on the Dragons for a deal. Also, an entrepreneur wants the Dragons’ to get wrapped up in her business; an engineer and doctor duo hope to receive a ringing endorsement. Plus, a marketing expert looks to pick the right partner for his berry business.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: An entrepreneur is determined to clean up the streets. Also, a team of restaurateurs noodle over the possibility of receiving a Dragon investment; a student flexes an opportunity for gains. Plus, business partners hope the Dragons don’t brush them off.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Big city distillers hope happy hour comes with a deal; an east coast team hopes their latest innovation will be music to the Dragons ears; and a company rises to the occasion when things get heated. Plus, business partners think springing a deal will get them a good night's rest.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Entrepreneurs hope the Dragons don’t churn them away; a married couple looks to scrub out the competition in an out of fashion market; and a company seeks an investment for a fetching new treat. Plus, a determined plant lover believes a deal will take root.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: In the season finale, a designer hopes her custom demonstration will sew up a Dragon deal; and a decorated entrepreneur hopes her journey to success lights a fire under the Dragons

17.name: Season 17
17.overview: Robert Herjavec returns to the Den for an exciting 17th season of Dragons' Den!

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In the season premiere, two Vancouver entrepreneurs hope to roll away with an investment; a duo from Montreal aims to take their imaging technology to new heights; and a former hockey player hopes to score a deal in the Den. Plus, a couple from Hamilton wows the dragons with an explosive demonstration.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: A West Coast entrepreneur aims to nail down an investment. Plus, two Toronto business partners capitalize on a cool new trend.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A father-daughter duo gears up to impress the Dragons with a shocking demonstration; and two business partners try to master the art of the deal.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: A New Brunswick entrepreneur and her business partner try to smooth things over with their hair product; things get rocky for a West Coast couple and their paddle boards; and a Montrealer’s invention is music to the Dragons’ ears. Plus, a Calgary entrepreneur makes a royal entrance into the Den.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Two Quebec City entrepreneurs impress the Dragons with a memorable entrance; a Montreal business owner brings a franchisee to share the floor; and four Toronto business partners hope the Dragons go with the flow of their pitch. Plus, an entrepreneur brings an instant celebration all the way from Vancouver Island.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Three business partners from Ontario take the Dragons to the 19th hole to share their beverage line; a Vancouver duo cozies up in the Den; and a West Coast entrepreneur struggles to hook the Dragons on her plant-based seafood. Plus, a former hydro worker shocks the Dragons with his wearable invention.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: A Calgary entrepreneur rides a wave of emotions in his pitch; a Toronto business owner has the Dragons wishing she had a larger bump in sales; and tension rises when an entrepreneur hopes to take his delivery service to new heights. Plus, one family has a musical entrance into the Den.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: A West Coast entrepreneur uncovers her underwear business; two Ontario entrepreneurs must learn to face the music; and business owners pitch a sweet solution to the Dragons. Also, the Dragons have a cow when an unexpected visitor enters the Den.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: A Toronto chef challenges the Dragons to a cooking competition; a Montreal entrepreneur says mined diamonds aren’t a girl’s best friend; and an Ontario entrepreneur tries to tie up a big deal with the Dragons. Also a Saskatchewan business owner tries to not freeze up against the Dragons.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: A West Coast entrepreneur wows the Dragons with his business and his energy; a Toronto business-owner accessorizes the Dragons; and an Alberta entrepreneur presents her solution for parents turned chauffeurs. Plus, a BC couple heats up the Den with their tea innovation.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: An off-grid couple presents their fermented brew; an Alberta team leads the Dragons in a cake-off; and a West Coast entrepreneur gives the Dragons a boost with her supplements. Also, a BC team finds themselves on the edge of a deal for their ski apparel.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: A West Coast duo arrives with precious cargo; an Ontario business owner freshens up the Den, and an entrepreneur revamps the Dragons’ credit cards. Also, a West Coast entrepreneur puts a new spin on an old product.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: An entrepreneur brings a tech solution for Michele’s closet; a West Coast family hopes their dreams of a deal don’t become sour grapes; and an Ontario duo puts their best foot forward. Plus, a couple from Ottawa tries to satisfy the Dragons’ sweet tooth.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: An entrepreneur couple puts on a show for the Dragons; a Toronto team brings some mojo to the Den; and a West Coast entrepreneur helps the Dragons get organized.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: A West Coast couple offers to protect to the Dragons; a duo from New Brunswick offers a tasty healthcare solution; and a Saskatchewan entrepreneur gets Wes to help fry up a deal. Also, an entrepreneur shows the Dragons how they can rent the runway.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: In this season finale special episode, Dragon’s Den - The After Effect. Catch up with 13 companies who braved the Dragons to find out what happens after the Den. Hear these alumni of the show speak on taking Dragon advice, building a brand, growing to unforeseen heights, expanding globally, and even exiting their company. Plus, hear from the Dragons about the key takeaways from the show and what it’s legacy means to them.

18.name: Season 18
18.overview: Dragons’ Den returns for its 18th season with 16 brand new episodes! Watch as a fresh crop of entrepreneurs face the fire, pitching to Canada’s most successful business tycoons.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Two Vancouver entrepreneurs hope the Dragons pounce on their innovative brand; brothers from Alberta look to charm the Den with their spirit; and an Ontarian mother shatters the glass ceiling. Plus, a proud Ajax resident tries not to scratch his chance at a deal—or Wes' car.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: A couple dares the Dragons to show their most intimate item of clothing; a duo steps into the Den striving for a golden deal; a young entrepreneur faces the fire to educate Dragons about curly hair.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A female entrepreneur swings her idea to the Dragons; two Manitoba entrepreneurs look for a safety net in the Dragons; Quebec business owners pop their idea into the Den; an Ontarian couple pitch their weightless idea.

19.name: Season 19
19.overview: Budding entrepreneurs, inventors, and small businessmen pitch their ideas to five "dragons"--real-life business leaders and millionaires.
